iata:paymentMeansIDissuer.description: Indicates the issuer of the payment means codes. E.g. EDIFACT list 4461 can be used from a Code list 'Cash' ; CreditTransfer

iata:paymentMeansID.description: Indicates the means of payment to be made for the Invoice. Standard codes from EDIFACT list 4461 can be used from a Code list Cash ; CreditTransfer

iata:paymenMeanstInstructionNote.description: Indicates the payment Instructions. Free text.
